description: I don't necessarily have the urge to climb there, but just imagine how amazing it would be if I had! Right?

goal: Audience with the Pope and tour of Vatican City
description: I'd absolutely cherish the opportunity to tour Vatican City with the Pope. Despite not being particularly religious and intending no disrespect, I can't help but be fascinated by the immense influence and authority held by the Pope.
I consider myself a skilled writer. Nevertheless, I grapple with 'stage fright' when it comes to sharing my work. I'm confident in my abilities; I just need to find my muse.
I've already had the honor of participating in the Olympic Torch Relay back in 1996. Now, I dream of taking those final steps to carry the torch and ignite the flame.
Technically, I possess a 1-acre plot of land in West Scotland. It's more of a whimsical claim than anything, but hey, I can boast a connection to the throne.
